parameters.query: SELECT id, provider_id, provider_slug, data, cached_at, expires_at, created_at FROM provider_cache WHERE provider_slug = $1 AND expires_at > NOW();

SELECT p.id, p.slug, p.name, p.timezone, p.settings, json_agg(json_build_object('id', s.id, 'name', s.name, 'duration_minutes', s.duration_minutes, 'price', s.price)) as services FROM providers p LEFT JOIN services s ON s.provider_id = p.id AND s.deleted_at IS NULL WHERE p.slug = $1 AND p.deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY p.id;

INSERT INTO provider_cache (id, provider_id, provider_slug, data, cached_at, expires_at, created_at) SELECT gen_random_uuid(), p.id, p.slug, json_build_object('id', p.id, 'slug', p.slug, 'name', p.name, 'timezone', p.timezone, 'settings', p.settings), NOW(), NOW() + INTERVAL '30 minutes', NOW() FROM providers p WHERE p.slug = $1 ON CONFLICT (provider_slug) DO UPDATE SET data = EXCLUDED.data, cached_at = NOW(), expires_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '30 minutes' RETURNING *;
DELETE FROM provider_cache WHERE provider_slug = $1 RETURNING provider_slug;
